about_the_game:
Works great on Steam Deck!

We're still waiting for Valve to officially verify Scarlet Deer Inn, but we've designed it to work well on it.



Scarlet Deer Inn is an embroidered narrative platformer with an emotional story, an interesting cast of characters, a dark dungeon full of monsters, and a world inspired by Slavic folklore. The only thing protecting you from certain death is your torch. All character images are actually embroidered, and we create the music ourselves using traditional instruments.



  • Meet colourful characters and enjoy emotional stories full of unforgettable experiences.
  • Look out for shortcuts in the dark which will make your next walkthrough easier.
  • Admire the beautiful hand-painted backgrounds and traditional animations.
  • Listen to folk music inspired by the Middle Ages and performed on traditional instruments.

THE STORY
Discover the story of Elise, a mother of two. She is not exactly extraordinary, and there are no heroic epics written about her.
Her circumstances will make her explore places full of interesting and unusual, as well as dark and terrifying situations.


THE TEAM
Attu Games is a husband-and-wife team from the Czech Republic. We try to make everything ourselves - from drawing, animations, and storytelling to programming, music, and publishing our games.
Scarlet Deer Inn draws inspiration from the amazing movies by the Ghibli studio, medieval Europe and Slavic folklore.
